title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist
description:
Bug 3666 - Code Completion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code.

As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.

Steps:
1. Change the baz call to baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first 'x.'
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up the code assist.
4. Type 'f' to filter the list.
5. Select 'foo()'.
EB:
The code should give me:
baz(x.foo().x.foo())
SR:
Change the baz call to
baz(x.x.foo())

Place the cursor after the first 'x.'
Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist.
Type 'f' to filter the list.
Select 'foo()'.
